content:
I've noticed that on the html page generated for a code system there are links to the Source Resource in XML, JSON and Turtle. The links generated for these appear to be prefixing the final part of the urls with "ValueSet" instead of "CodeSystem".
For example, the XML, JSON and Turtle links in the Code System table at http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/CodeSystem-contact-purpose.html
